The DMV processed 233,791 applications in 2019 — slightly fewer than in 2018, when the DMV denied over 30,000 of its 249,000 requests, according to the suit. The combination of characters runs from the ordinary such as “GO CAL” to more inside references on other subjects. On Occasion, these combinations can be seen as offensive to a casual viewer.
To Help California DMV to Develop model and Prototype for reviewing license plates and rejecting those that fall outside of first amendment protections using state-of-the-art NLP Models.
